Title: Blackwater
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), George R.R. Martin
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Liam Cunningham
Plot: Stannis Baratheon's fleet and army arrive at King's Landing and the battle for the city begins. Cersei plans for her and her children's future.
